title: After mass layoffs at Twitter, what will Elon Musk do next?
itunes:title: After mass layoffs at Twitter, what will Elon Musk do next?
description:
The Verge reports on Elon Musk’s latest move at Twitter: mass layoffs.

NPR explains why voters in five states are deciding whether to go further than the 13th Amendment on slavery.

Nearly 100,000 people have been displaced by gangs in Haiti, and cholera is spreading, the Miami Herald reports. There are also concerns about safety over Haitian skies after an attempted kidnapping of air traffic controllers.

Some people who got special “temporary” tattoos have discovered that the ink is much longer-lasting than they thought. The San Francisco Chronicle spoke to them.
content:encoded:
The Verge reports on Elon Musk’s latest move at Twitter: mass layoffs.

NPR explains why voters in five states are deciding whether to go further than the 13th Amendment on slavery.

Nearly 100,000 people have been displaced by gangs in Haiti, and cholera is spreading, the Miami Herald reports. There are also concerns about safety over Haitian skies after an attempted kidnapping of air traffic controllers.

Some people who got special “temporary” tattoos have discovered that the ink is much longer-lasting than they thought. The San Francisco Chronicle spoke to them.
